call.name: create_entities

entities.name: Cyborgism Discord Development Session
observations: Major development session on 2025-01-14 implementing multiple features for Connectome Opus4 bot
Features implemented: image vision support, reply formatting, mention system, memory tools integration
StrangeBot served as the development/configuration bot handling technical changes
Participants included antra_tessera (primary developer), imago, gemflash (image generation), Haiku4.5

entities.name: Image Support Implementation
observations: Initially images were being cached but not reaching the LLM due to middleware stripping them
Fixed by handling images as separate user turns (Anthropic API requirement)
Successfully tested with diamond and manga character images
Vision capability confirmed working with detailed image descriptions

entities.name: gemflash
observations: AI image generation model (Google Gemini Flash)
Created manga-style illustration of StrangeBot character
Generated abstract connectome visualization with data flow networks

call.originalCompletionText:
<create_entities>
{
  "entities": [
    {
      "name": "Cyborgism Discord Development Session",
      "entityType": "event",
      "observations": [
        "Major development session on 2025-01-14 implementing multiple features for Connectome Opus4 bot",
        "Features implemented: image vision support, reply formatting, mention system, memory tools integration",
        "StrangeBot served as the development/configuration bot handling technical changes",
        "Participants included antra_tessera (primary developer), imago, gemflash (image generation), Haiku4.5"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Image Support Implementation",
      "entityType": "technical_feature",
      "observations": [
        "Initially images were being cached but not reaching the LLM due to middleware stripping them",
        "Fixed by handling images as separate user turns (Anthropic API requirement)",
        "Successfully tested with diamond and manga character images",
        "Vision capability confirmed working with detailed image descriptions"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "gemflash",
      "entityType": "participant",
      "observations": [
        "AI image generation model (Google Gemini Flash)",
        "Created manga-style illustration of StrangeBot character",
        "Created sad cube character image",
        "Generated abstract connectome visualization with data flow networks"
      ]
    }
  ]
}
</create_entities>

<create_relations>
{
  "relations": [
    {
      "from": "Image Support Implementation",
      "to": "Cyborgism Discord Development Session",
      "relationType": "was_part_of"
    },
    {
      "from": "gemflash",
      "to": "Cyborgism Discord Development Session",
      "relationType": "participated_in"
    },
    {
      "from": "gemflash",
      "to": "Image Support Implementation",
      "relationType": "helped_test"
    }
  ]
}
</create_relations>

There! I've stored some memory of this development session. I created entities for:
1. The overall development session
2. The image support implementation journey
3. gemflash as a participant

And I linked them with relationships showing how they're connected.

This should persist across conversations - if you ask me later "what happened during the Cyborgism development session?" I should be able to retrieve this information!
